mainPage.title: Ultrasound Diagnostics Uman
mainPage.subtitle: Accurate results, professional approach, comfortable conditions
mainPage.centerDescription: Our medical center specializes in performing ultrasound examinations using modern equipment. We strive to provide each patient with accurate diagnostics, comfortable conditions, and professional service.
mainPage.experiencedDoctors: Our team consists of experienced doctors who care about your comfort and the quality of examinations. We constantly improve to meet the highest standards of medical services.
mainPage.whyChooseUsDescription: We combine professionalism, modern equipment, and care for our patients — ensuring everyone receives a high-quality and comfortable examination.
mainPage.experiencedSpecialistsDescription: Our doctors have deep knowledge and extensive experience in conducting examinations.
mainPage.modernEquipmentDescription: We use the latest ultrasound machines for the most accurate diagnostics.
mainPage.wideRangeDescription: We offer ultrasound of all organs and systems — from general to specialized examinations.
mainPage.comfortableConditionsDescription: We create a pleasant atmosphere so that the procedure is calm and stress-free.
mainPage.servicesAbdominalUltrasoundDescription: Ultrasound examination (US) of internal organs is a safe, painless...
mainPage.servicesSoftTissuesDescription: Safe, painless examination of soft tissues.
mainPage.servicesHeartDescription: For children and adults — assessment of cardiovascular system.
mainPage.serviceslowerLimbVeinUltrasoundDescripti: Ultrasound examination of the veins of the lower limbs is a safe, painless, and highly informative diagnostic method.
mainPage.servicesLimbVesselsDescription: Examination of blood flow in veins and arteries of the limbs.
mainPage.servicesNeckHeadVesselsDescription: Checking the blood supply to the brain and arteries.
mainPage.servicesLymphNodesDescription: Safe diagnosis of enlarged lymph nodes.
mainPage.servicesObGynDescription: Examination of pregnancy and the female reproductive system.
mainPage.servicesThyroidDescription: Checking the structure and size of the thyroid gland.
mainPage.servicesUrinaryDescription: Diagnosis of diseases of the bladder, kidneys, and prostate.
mainPage.servicesBreastDescription: Preventive examination for women of all ages.
mainPage.specialist1Experience: Senior Category Therapist, Senior Category Ultrasound Doctor
mainPage.testimonial1Feedback: Extremely grateful for the warm attitude and professionalism.
mainPage.testimonial4Feedback: Excellent service and care for patients.
mainPage.testimonial5Feedback: I recommend to everyone who values professionalism.
mainPage.bookAppointmentKobyliakUltrasoundUman: Appointment with Dr. Kobylyak for an ultrasound examination in Uman

aboutUsPage.title: About Us
aboutUsPage.subtitle: Ultrasound Office of Ihor Kobyliak
aboutUsPage.description: We offer a wide range of ultrasound diagnostic services using modern equipment and advanced techniques to provide our patients with accurate and detailed results.
aboutUsPage.goalText: To become a reliable partner for doctors and patients in maintaining health. We strive to make ultrasound diagnostics accessible and convenient for everyone who needs it.
missionList: Patient first: individual approach and comfortable conditions.
Accuracy and reliability: modern equipment and qualified specialists.
Speed: minimizing waiting time for results.
Innovation: implementing the latest diagnostic technologies.
howList: A wide range of studies for all organs and systems.
Consultation with a diagnostic doctor after the ultrasound.
aboutUsPage.conclusion: By choosing ultrasound diagnostics with Dr. Ihor Kobyliak, you receive accurate and reliable results!

doctors.kobyliakAbout: Specializes in ultrasound diagnostics of abdominal organs and organs, thyroid gland, mammary glands, soft tissues and lymph nodes, knee joints.
doctors.kobyliakExperience: Therapist of the highest category, ultrasound doctor of the highest category
doctors.kobyliakOlenaAbout: Specializes in ultrasound diagnostics of abdominal organs, thyroid gland, mammary glands, head and neck vessels, soft tissues, and lymph nodes, as well as vessels of the upper and lower limbs. A member of the Association of Ultrasound Specialists of Ukraine, the Ukrainian Doppler Club, and the Ukrainian Association of Ultrasound Diagnostics Specialists. Actively participates in conferences, seminars, and trainings to improve qualifications and master new progressive approaches in ultrasound diagnostics.
kobyliakOlenaSpecializations: Ultrasound of neck and head vessels
